name: star-magic-uqff
description: Star-Magic Unified Quantum Field Force (UQFF) v2.2 - Enhanced Edition with 446 modules, SOURCE1-116 integration, self-expanding framework 2.0, 26D quantum polynomials, Wolfram hypergraph physics, MinGW threading compatibility

scripts.test:source134: node -e "const A2256 = require('./source134.js'); const m = new A2256(); console.log('✓ Source134 loaded:', m.getSystemName()); const report = m.generateReport(); console.log('M =', report.parameters.M.toExponential(2), 'kg');"
scripts.test:source4: node -e "const idx = require('./index.js'); const s4 = new idx.Source4UQFFModule(); console.log('✓ Source4 MUGE Framework loaded'); console.log('Ug1:', s4.computeUg1(1e10, 0, 1.989e30).toExponential(3));"
scripts.test:source5: node -e "const idx = require('./index.js'); const s5 = new idx.Source5UQFFModule(); console.log('✓ Source5 Self-Expanding Framework loaded'); console.log('FU Enhanced:', s5.computeFUEnhanced({M: 1.989e30, r: 1e10, t: 0}).toExponential(3));"
scripts.test:source6: node -e "const idx = require('./index.js'); const s6 = new idx.Source6UQFFModule(); console.log('✓ Source6 3D Graphics Module loaded'); s6.printSummaryStats();"
scripts.verify: node -e "console.log('Verifying modules...'); const idx = require('./index.js'); console.log('✓ All modules loaded successfully'); console.log('✓ Source4-6 integrated:', typeof idx.Source4UQFFModule, typeof idx.Source5UQFFModule, typeof idx.Source6UQFFModule);"

author: Daniel T. Murphy
